sentences.en: A vagrant current - an underwater breeze thick with plankton - passed between them.
sentences.cn: 一股水流穿过他们中间,那是富含浮游生物的水中微风.

sentences.en: A vagrant is everywhere at home.
Alternate status: life as a homeless vagrant really isn?t so bad after all. Why did I go to college again?
sentences.cn: 我现在觉得，做一个无家可归的流浪者没有什么不好啊。 为什么我还要回学校继承上学呢？

sentences.en: And so far I still live the life of a vagrant.
sentences.cn: 直到现在还是过着流浪的生活.

sentences.en: He is the justice of the peace that jug me for a vagrant.
sentences.cn: 他就是把我作为游民关进牢房的治安法官.

sentences.en: He lived on the street as a vagrant.
sentences.cn: 他以在大街上乞讨为生。

sentences.en: I must to the seas again, to the vagrant gypsy life.
sentences.cn: 我要再到大海去, 过吉卜赛人般的流浪生活.

sentences.en: I told you to act like a drunk vagrant imbecile.
sentences.cn: 我告诉你,要装得象个喝醉的白痴.

sentences.en: Port City North Carolina: During a routine camp out| a local vagrant discovers plans for an invasion in America.
sentences.cn: 港口城市北卡罗来纳州：在例行营地| 一个当地的流浪者发现了在美国入侵的计划。

sentences.en: Spring flowers residual cardiac deficiencies go, how autumn vagrant hearts?
sentences.cn: 春心未尽花残去, 秋风怎过荡子心?

sentences.en: The degree of contrast will also be diminished by the presence of some vagrant ordinary light.
sentences.cn: 反差度还将因某些杂散自然光的存在而降低.

sentences.en: The moon glows like phosphorous on the vagrant waters.
sentences.cn: 月亮像磷光在漂浮的水面上发光.

sentences.en: The moon glows like phosphorus on the vagrant waters.
sentences.cn: 月在漂浮的水面上象磷光般闪亮.

sentences.en: The vagrant had to beg for money.
sentences.cn: 那个流浪汉不得不乞求钱财.

sentences.en: Vagrant in the province is popular , with a Sang persuade farmers.
sentences.cn: 于兹省氓俗, 一用劝农桑.

sentences.en: We met a band of vagrant beggars there .
sentences.cn: 我们在那里遇到了一伙流浪的乞丐。

sentences.en: We met a band of vagrant beggars there.
sentences.cn: 我们在那里遇到了一伙流浪的乞丐.

sentences.en: You shall be a vagrant and a wanderer on earth.
sentences.cn: 你会成为流浪汉,到处漂泊.

trans.tran_cn: 流浪者，<律>无业游民，乞丐，无赖
